metadata.name: InfDefaultInstall.exe .inf Execution
metadata.comment: Executes SCT script using scrobj.dll from a command in entered into a specially prepared INF file.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('infdefaultinstall.exe ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.inf')))

output.summary: Executes SCT script using scrobj.dll from a command in entered into a specially prepared INF file.

metadata.objective: Examine fields: ComputerName, actor.user.name, process.cmd_line, process.parent_process.cmd_line False positive: Unknown References: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1218/T1218.md#atomic-test-4---infdefaultinstallexe-inf-execution, https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Infdefaultinstall/
